# Humza Tareen — AI Engineer & Researcher

> AI Engineer who ships production systems with enterprise clients. IEEE-published researcher. Building at the intersection of AI, cloud infrastructure, and developer tooling.

## About

Humza Tareen is an AI Engineer based in Islamabad, Pakistan. He has delivered GenAI solutions for Fortune 500 clients including Apple, Meta, and Bytedance. He holds a BS in Computer Science from NUST and is published in IEEE EMBC 2025. He is certified in IBM Cloud Pak for Integration, Mulesoft, and Microsoft Power Platform.

## Key Areas of Expertise

- **Cloud Architecture**: Multiple Cloud Run microservices, GKE clusters, and managed databases on GCP
- **AI/ML Infrastructure**: RAG systems with pgvector, LLM evaluation pipelines, reinforcement learning training arenas
- **Event-Driven Systems**: Pub/Sub, Cloud Tasks, Cloud Scheduler, dead-letter queues
- **DevOps & Security**: CI/CD with GitHub Actions, Cloud Build, security auditing, structured logging
- **Open Source**: Created Rigour (AI code quality tool, rapid iteration and continuous delivery)

## Blog Articles

- [Building an AI Evaluation Platform on GCP](https://humzakt.github.io/blog/building-ai-evaluation-platform-gcp.html): Architecture deep-dive into multiple microservices, Kubernetes clusters, and managed databases
- [Event-Driven Architecture on GCP](https://humzakt.github.io/blog/event-driven-architecture-gcp-pubsub.html): Pub/Sub, Cloud Tasks, Cloud Scheduler patterns for a 6-phase pipeline
- [Debugging AlloyDB SSL Connection Drops](https://humzakt.github.io/blog/debugging-alloydb-ssl-connection-drops.html): Root cause analysis of 5% task failure rate — fixed with 3 lines
- [Idempotent Cloud Tasks Handlers in Python](https://humzakt.github.io/blog/idempotent-cloud-tasks-handlers-python.html): The pattern that eliminated duplicate record bugs
- [Zero-Downtime Embedding Migration](https://humzakt.github.io/blog/rag-embedding-migration-zero-downtime.html): Switching RAG embedding models in production with pgvector
- [Open-Source AI Code Quality Tool](https://humzakt.github.io/blog/open-source-rigour-ai-code-quality.html): Rigour — quality gate for AI-generated code
- [RL Training Arena for Code Agents](https://humzakt.github.io/blog/rl-training-arena-code-agents.html): Reinforcement learning on GKE with Cloud Build sandboxing
- [Security Audit: Critical Gaps Found](https://humzakt.github.io/blog/security-audit-ai-platform-25-critical-issues.html): SQL injection, hardcoded credentials, and a monolithic God Class

## Service Deep-Dives

- [Core AI Evaluation Engine](https://humzakt.github.io/blog/atlas-evaluations-core-engine.html): AlloyDB SSL fixes, KEDA autoscaling, Firestore misrouting, headless API
- [Automated LLM Scoring Service](https://humzakt.github.io/blog/auto-rater-service-llm-scoring.html): Idempotent Cloud Tasks, LiteLLM proxy, Redis state, VPC networking
- [Auth Gateway & Admin Dashboard](https://humzakt.github.io/blog/guard-service-auth-gateway.html): JWT, OIDC, Kong, notifications admin, critical security vulnerabilities
- [Notification Service](https://humzakt.github.io/blog/notification-service-event-delivery.html): Cloud Tasks delivery, circuit breakers, webhook dispatch
- [RAG Retrieval Service](https://humzakt.github.io/blog/rag-service-embedding-search.html): pgvector, emergency embedding migration, provenance tracking
- [RL Training Arena](https://humzakt.github.io/blog/rl-arena-executor-preprocessor.html): Gym-style API, Cloud Build sandboxing, comprehensive test coverage
- [The Connective Tissue of an AI Platform](https://humzakt.github.io/blog/workflow-taxonomy-platform-services.html): HITL workflow orchestration with WebSocket, taxonomy-based task routing, JWT auth, LLM memory evaluation
